Html: I'm sure you guys are already busy trying to stomp out the various bugs and get new features working. So, do you want us to log tickets about issues at the moment or would you rather we give you a few weeks to smooth things out first?

We want tickets but only for new issues. and read the thread on Rawr4 first as most of the stuff that's coming up is because of users having used Rawr3 before (Rawr4 has different requirements and needs new caches).
